Class CopyMachine

extends DefaultImporter

                    ICoreSession localSession,
                    SmObjectImpl newLocalParent)
        Description copied from class: AbstractImporter
        Called by AbstractImporter.fixRoots(ICoreSession, SmObjectImpl, List).

        Change the composition owner of the map keys to the given parent, using the map values as dependency.

        Overrides:
        reparentElements in class DefaultImporter
        Parameters:
        toReparent - the map of elements to reparent in the target local model
        localSession - the target local session
        newLocalParent - the target root destination element where roots should be reparented to.
